item.title: Script Writing and AI Video Development for Enrollware Data Entry Training Video -Interview Required - Upwork
item.description:
Overview:
We are looking for a skilled individual or team to update and develop an AI-powered training video for our Enrollware data entry procedures. The goal is to replace our current video on YouTube with an updated version that includes specific enhancements and revisions. Video: https://youtu.be/NWaQTQf9N9o

Scope of Work:

Script Writing: Develop an updated script for our Enrollware data entry training video. The script should mirror our current video while incorporating the following updates:

Update instructions on how to input a course location correctly at (1:54) and (2:02), using the comments section to help instructors stay organized.
Introduce the types of course documents required under the documents section before (2:34): Online Blended Learning Completion Certificates, Skill Sheets, and Written Exam Answer Sheets.
Update instructions for entering a written exam score for AHA courses:
For courses requiring a written exam (e.g., BLS, ACLS, PALS, ASLS), specify entering "Complete" or "Incomplete".
For AHA Courses without a written exam (e.g., Heartsaver CPRAED First Aid), provide specific instructions.
Specify that the following documents are required to be kept on file for a minimum of three years per course: Roster, Skills Sheets, Written Exam Answer Sheet, Blended Learning Completion Certificates.
Add a new section at (3:18) detailing "How to issue eCards".
Divide the video at 3:25 into two segments: one designed for Training Sites and another continuing the instructional flow.
AI Video Development: Utilize AI technology to create the updated training video based on the revised script. The video should be engaging, professional, and suitable for uploading to YouTube.

Deliverables:

Revised script for the Enrollware data entry training video.
AI-generated training video incorporating the script revisions, segmented as specified.
Video format suitable for uploading to YouTube.
Requirements:

Proven experience in script writing for instructional or training videos.
Expertise in utilizing AI tools for video production and editing.
Familiarity with Enrollware or similar training management systems preferred.
Ability to deliver high-quality work within agreed timelines.
Timeline:
We expect the project to be completed within [insert expected timeline].

Budget:
Please provide your estimated cost for completing the entire project, including script writing and video development.

How to Apply:
If you are interested and meet the requirements, please submit your proposal outlining your approach to the project, relevant experience, and examples of similar work.

We look forward to hearing from qualified candidates who can help us enhance our training video to better serve our needs and those of our instructors.

Budget: $1,500
Posted On: June 21, 2024 17:03 UTC
Category: Data Entry
Skills:Content Writing, English, Video Editing, Education, AI Video Generation, AI Video Generator
Skills: Content Writing, English, Video Editing, Education, AI Video Generation, AI Video Generator
Country: United States
click to apply

item.title: Social Media Graphic and Video Artist - Needed for F&B and CPG brand - Upwork
item.description:
The biggest innovation in Indian Confectionery requires an experienced and highly creative Digital Marketer to drive traffic and, ultimately, sales.

Our company has patent-pending technology set to revolutionize Indian confectionery forever. The project seeks to touch the lives of millions worldwide, starting in the US.

We are looking to grow into a world-class brand, and we need creative individuals who can excite and inform through their work.

Key to the selection of any candidates are the following qualities:
Honesty | Trust | Kindness | Passion.

Our company is a startup, so if you are going to charge multinational rates, we are unlikely to be your client. However, if you feel that your high-quality expertise has been undervalued and unappreciated, this will absolutely be your opportunity to shine.

Backed by some of the biggest names in confectionary in the US, the right candidate could showcase the work worldwide.

Goals
• Establish a strong online presence and brand recognition.
• Educate consumers on the unique benefits of our products.
• Achieve significant user engagement and customer acquisition.

Ultimately, we want to ensure that our brand —becomes a beloved, well-recognized, and trusted brand in the South Asian Confectionary market.

Social Media – Activities (But Not Limited to the Following):
• Social Media Platform Selection:
Focus on Instagram and Facebook due to their visual nature and broad demographic reach. Secondary focus should be Pinterest for reaching audiences interested in food, health, and cultural recipes.

• Content Creation:
Share high-quality images and short videos of the sweets, emphasizing their artisanal quality and health benefits. Post about the ingredients and health aspects of each product, including benefits like being diabetic-friendly. Share stories behind indian confectionary, exploring its cultural significance and festive associations.

Please provide proof of food-related projects you have done - CPG. Instagram links etc.


Posted On: June 21, 2024 16:59 UTC
Category: Graphic Design
Skills:Graphic Design, Video Editing, Instagram, Facebook
Skills: Graphic Design, Video Editing, Instagram, Facebook
Country: United States
click to apply

item.title: Talking Head Youtube Video Editor - Upwork
item.description:
Looking for someone to help me edit some youtube videos for a client pretty quickly

Here's the style of video I'm looking to replicate. And when I say replicate I basically want you to apply the same style for a few different videos that are about 10 minutes long.

I'm looking to get about 50$-75$ per video and I'll have 3-6 videos like this that I'll need edited over the next few weeks

I'm looking for a quick turnaround time and bonus if you can make thumbnails/ edit short form content

Here's the example video: (https://www.youtube.com/@guardianduediligence)

please make sure to leave your turnaround time and price for a video with this exact style of editing

FYI: don't apply if you don't have loads of talking head video in your portfolio

Budget: $350

item.title: Gen AI Educational YouTube Video Editor (Retention Focus) - Upwork
item.description:
About AI Evolved:

AI Evolved is dedicated to educating business owners, creative professionals, and freelancers on the importance of integrating generative AI into design, automation, and marketing.

The mission is to increase output, save time, and decrease costs through the effective utilisation of AI throughout the creative process.

Channel link: https://www.youtube.com/@aievolved

Job Overview:

We are seeking a talented video editor to join our team and help create engaging, high-quality educational videos for our YouTube channel.

Responsibilities:

- Edit and assemble recorded raw material into a polished final product.

- Add graphics, animations, and special effects.

- Ensure logical sequencing and smooth transitions.

- Collaborate effectively to meet project deadlines.

Requirements:

- Proven experience as a video editor with a strong portfolio.

- Proficiency in Adobe Premiere Pro, Final Cut Pro, or similar software.

- Experience with motion graphics and special effects.

- Strong attention to detail and ability to work under tight deadlines.

- Excellent communication skills.

Preferred Qualifications:

- Experience in creating educational or tutorial videos
Interest in generative AI, design, automation, or marketing.

What is the long-term goal?

To create comprehensive courses for free on YouTube for multiple use cases across design, automation, and marketing.

I would need someone who can edit in such a way to increase retention and consequently, open up the viewership to a wider audience. Address me as Mr. Snowman to qualify for this position.

More can be discussed on the initial call.

Thanks

Vay


Hourly Range: $5.00-$10.00
Posted On: June 21, 2024 16:39 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Audio Editing, Explainer Video, Video Editing, Motion Graphics, Adobe Premiere Pro
Skills: Audio Editing, Explainer Video, Video Editing, Motion Graphics, Adobe Premiere Pro
Country: United Kingdom
click to apply

item.title: Need three 5 minute FHD or 4K or 8K footage of a female model talking - Upwork
item.description:
Hi, I personally need a4K or 8K RAW footage (Great if you can shoot with Canon EOS R5)of a female model reading news, which doesn't need any post production.

The footage is used personally as a reference for making facial animation of a realistic 3d character talking( which is also not going to be released public).

WHAT YOU NEED FOR THIS JOB

~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
1. An FHD/4K/8K camera
2.Artificial studio lighting
(You need a bright setting since the footage must be shot in the settings below
ISO 100, Iris:F9 or above)
3.A Female model
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

I need three 5 minute video shot from 3 different angles. One is a shot of the model's face, another is a close-up of the model's mouth, and another is also a close-up of the mouth from a different angle. You are going to record 2 parts for each angle, one is a free talk of your choice (2mins), and another is for reading a news article (3 mins, any article is OK) this makes 5mins for each videos.

I prefer someone who can keep on speaking in a constant speed without stopping at all (I don't even want the model to drink spit, the model must keep on speaking without stopping at all)

You can either shoot yourself, or shoot someone else, but I need sample photos or footage of the model before hiring you. I prefer applicants who can provide good lighting!

Budget: $70
Posted On: June 21, 2024 16:43 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Video Editing
Skills: Video Editing
Country: Japan
click to apply

item.title: Video Editor for Body Cam Video Translation - Upwork
item.description:
We are looking for a skilled video editor who can assist with translating body cam video footage. The job involves synchronizing subtitles and working exclusively with Adobe Premiere Pro. The ideal candidate should have experience in video editing, particularly with subtitling and syncing audio and video.  It's a simple jobs we will provided the script for every video so you only need to transform it into subtitles.
Attention to detail and accuracy is crucial for this project. Strong communication skills and the ability to work independently and meet deadlines are also necessary.
Here's the example of the video: https://youtube.com/@thehiddenfiles?si=VdXqyYpbczZIFj6A

If you are passionate about video editing and have the necessary skills, we would love to hear from you! We response every applicants!

Budget: $80
Posted On: June 21, 2024 16:34 UTC
Category: General Translation Services
Skills:Video Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro, Video Post-Editing, Video Production, Video Commercial

If you are passionate about video editing and have the necessary skills, we would love to hear from you! We response every applicants!

Budget: $80

item.title: Youtube Videos - Record and edit "How to"-Videos, Screencast Style - Upwork
item.description:
Project Overview:
Create a series of concise, screencast-style YouTube videos titled "How to [Keyword]". Each video will focus on answering simple, everyday questions regarding the usage of famous apps (example Instagram, Facebook, Telegram, Tiktok etc.) and web services.

Examples & References

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=ZDCgqLIv7FY
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=GsVX02uNAWo
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=yCSzvIKxK-A

Target Run Time:
1-3 minutes per video.

What we are looking for:

Footage Creation:
Recording Step-By-Step Tutorial Screencasts/Video from Apps (example: Record the Process of how to delete your Facebook Account)

Script:
Create a narration script for the “How to” video, explaining Step-By-Step “how to” do something in the App (example: Explain how to delete your Facebook Account).

Voiceover Production:
Create an AI-Voiceover with Elevenlabs.com.

Editing & Production:
Edit the footage and voiceover together, ensuring a smooth flow. Add suitable background music and any necessary graphics or text overlays to enhance viewer understanding and engagement.

Fact-checking & Quality Control:
Ensure all information presented is accurate and the final product meets high production standards.

Copyright Considerations:
Utilize only your own screen recordings of navigating through the app/website/service, ensuring there are no copyright issues.

Expected Outcomes:
High Quality, Informative and easy-to-follow step-by-step tutorial  how-to-videos.
High user retention due to the direct and clear presentation of information.

Timeline and Deliverables:
A proposed timeline for the production of each video.

Deliverables:
Complete video ready for upload.
Format: MP4, AVI

Budget:
5$ per Video

Skills required:

- Video editing software (e.g. CapCut, Adobe Premiere Pro, Final Cut Pro)
- Writing of Step By Step Explanation script.
- Attention to detail

Budget: $5
Posted On: June 21, 2024 16:27 UTC
Category: Video Production
Skills:How To, Video Production, Screencasting Video, Explainer Video, Tutorial, Screen Recording
Skills: How To, Video Production, Screencasting Video, Explainer Video, Tutorial, Screen Recording
Country: Germany
click to apply

item.title: Real Estate Video Editor - Upwork
item.description:
We are seeking a skilled Real Estate Video Editor to join our team. As a Video Editor, you will be responsible for editing listing videos, incorporating motion graphics, and ensuring high-quality outputs. The ideal candidate should be well-versed in color grading techniques and have a strong understanding of visual storytelling. Attention to detail, creativity, and the ability to work under tight deadlines are essential.
  

Skills required:
  
- Proficient in video editing software (Adobe Premiere Pro, Final Cut Pro, etc.)
  
- Strong knowledge of motion graphics and visual effects
  
- Experience in color grading
  
- Attention to detail and ability to follow guidelines
  
- Excellent communication and collaboration skills
  
- Knowledge of real estate industry is a plus
  

This is a medium-sized project expected to last for 1 to 3 months. We are more interested in the quality of your work than in the length of your experience. Whether you're a seasoned professional or a beginner, show us what you can do, and let's work towards a long-term collaboration

Hourly Range: $10.00-$30.00
Posted On: June 21, 2024 16:24 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Color Grading, Video Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro, Adobe After Effects
Skills: Color Grading, Video Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro, Adobe After Effects
Country: Canada
click to apply

item.title: Video Editor for Intro and Transition Scenes - Upwork
item.description:
We are looking for a skilled Video Editor who can create an engaging intro and extra transition video scene for our project. The ideal candidate will have experience in video editing and motion graphics. The main tasks include designing and editing dynamic intro and transition scenes that align with the overall theme and style of the project. The final deliverables should be visually appealing, professional, and enhance the overall viewing experience.

    Skills required:
    - Video editing
    - Motion graphics
    - Creative design
    - Attention to detail
    - Proficiency in video editing software

    This is a medium-sized project with a duration of under 1 month. We are seeking an intermediate level expert who can bring creativity and technical expertise to the table. If you have a portfolio that showcases your previous work in intro and transition scenes, we'd love to see it. Join our team and help us create compelling video content that leaves a lasting impression.

Budget: $100
Posted On: June 21, 2024 16:21 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Adobe After Effects, Adobe Premiere Pro, Video Editing, Video Production, Video Intro & Outro
Skills: Adobe After Effects, Adobe Premiere Pro, Video Editing, Video Production, Video Intro & Outro
Country: Netherlands
click to apply
